**Collective Soul**: The notion of merging individual souls into a unified whole resonates with the Catholic concept of Communion.
**Merging with God:** In Catholic tradition, humans aim to reunite with God after death through spiritual purification (Purgatory) and ultimately become part of the Communion of Saints.
